thread.title: Funky meets location
thread.title_full: Funky meets location - Review of The High Line Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: AtlantaLadybugBarb
title: Funky meets location
text:
Tiny lobby full of guests with dogs, people studying and on their computers, and a flow between the shared coffee shop/bar. Former seminar offers tiny but well outfitted rooms. You can invision the former students hunched over their desk, being warmed by the fireplace (now not functional) while reading by the light flowing in from the big windows. Water pressure in the shower is amazing - wish I had that at home. During warmer months there is also alfresco dining available. Convienantly located by restaurants, museums, art galleries galore, and just across the street from High Line access.
